var getCookie=function getCookie(name){var value="; "+document.cookie;var parts=value.split("; ".concat(name,"="));//; user_id =
if(parts.length===2){return parts.pop().split(";").shift();}};var setCookie=function setCookie(name,value){var exp=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:5;var date=new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+exp*24*60*60*1000);document.cookie="".concat(name,"=").concat(value,";expires=").concat(date.toUTCString(),";path=/");};var deleteCookie=function deleteCookie(name){var date=new Date("2020-01-01").toUTCString();console.log(date);document.cookie=name+"=; expires="+date;};export{getCookie,setCookie,deleteCookie};
